name: STHELL - Prologue
description: STHELL is a fast-paced arena shooter that will take you to a forgotten swamp that was once a test site of Kiratron Industries. Try the first 02:15 minutes of the fight and take on hundreds of machines left to rust for years. It's a battle you probably won't win, but make a stand and your resilience will be etched in their memory chips forever!
